headline: AMD Leverages Partner Base to Aid Data Center Growth: What's Ahead?
summary: AMD expands its AI and data center dominance through major partnerships, including a multi-year OpenAI deal to deploy Instinct GPUs.

headline: Smart Infrastructure Market Surges to $2,109.5 billion by 2029 - Dominated by Siemens (Germany), Cisco, (US), Honeywell (US)

headline: TD SYNNEX Launches Global FinOps Practice in Collaboration with IBM to Help Partners Maximize Cloud Profitability
summary: FREMONT, Calif. & CLEARWATER, Fla., October 14, 2025--TD SYNNEX (NYSE: SNX) today announced the launch of a TD SYNNEX Global FinOps Practice powered by IBM Cloudability.

headline: Nasuni Appoints Nick Burling to Chief Product Officer as Company Advances to Next Phase of Unstructured Data Innovation
summary: Nasuni, a leading unified file data platform company, today announced the promotion of Nick Burling to Chief Product Officer (CPO). Formerly the company's Senior Vice President of Product, Burling joined Nasuni in 2021 with deep experience in product management and strategy at startups and global technology leaders including IBM and Microsoft. headline: The Basque Government and IBM inaugurate Europe's first IBM Quantum System Two in Donostia-San Sebastián
summary: The Basque Government and IBM (NYSE: IBM) today unveiled the first IBM Quantum System Two in Europe at the IBM-Euskadi Quantum Computational Center in San Sebastián. The installation of this system marks a milestone in the partnership between the two parties, which began in 2023 within the framework of the BasQ – Basque Quantum initiative, promoted by the Basque Government to help make Euskadi an international hub for quantum technologies.
